website_summaries.verdict: Final Draft is the software you need if you are in the screenwriting business or aspire to be. It has all the tools you need to get the script right, both from a story perspective and a technical one.
pros: Powerful tools for both writing scenes and crafting the larger story
cons: Collaborative editing restricted to one person at a time
Inadequate default auto-save and revision history

customer_reviews.title: "Open Box" Item
customer_reviews.text: Bought the product "Opened Box". What I received was simply a flash drive all by itself in an enveloped wrapped in the receipt issued by Amazon. There was not any instructions, any product key code, nothing. When I inserted the flash drive into my computer it had"Windows 10" on it with an installation file and a couple of other files on it. Nothing to indicate there was a FinalDraft program on the drive. I have applied for a refund and will never purchase anything from TNG Computers again.
customer_reviews.author: kumquat

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The software was on a thumb drive that didn't work. I complained several times to the company. Amazon gave me a refund after the company was unresponsive.
customer_reviews.author: B.J. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great software. I'd recommend this to anyone trying to ...

customer_reviews.text: I amstill working my way around final draft, working a novel and a screenplay. So far, ll is good. Final Draft helps me think.
customer_reviews.author: Julima

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great software - looks a little older format, but has a lot of capability
customer_reviews.author: James D Poulin

customer_reviews.title: Buy this immediately!!
customer_reviews.text: This software consolidates things I used to do on file cards, whiteboards, notepads, sticky notes, rolls of paper for time line and story line, color-coding with markers or colored paper, cards, etc. It's really the cat's pajamas if you're serious enough to take a few days to learn it (the tutorials are terrible, but Lynda.com does a little better job. All things considered, it's pretty easy to learn because they include fully developed scripts, outlines, notes, etc. that give you a quick idea of how to use the program.) Once you master this stuff, you just tab and enter away, with only a few intermittent commands. You'll love it, but only if you really learn it.
customer_reviews.author: Leo Zupan

customer_reviews.title: THE VERY BEST SCRIPT WRITING PROGRAM EVER
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE, LOVE, LOVE FINAL DRAFT. I love the product. I love the customer service. I love everything about it. Writing in FD is the only way to go, plus, I can't speak highly enough about the customer service. Any time I'm stuck or have an issue, they're always there to help me through it. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: Great Screenwriting Software that is easy to learn
customer_reviews.text: I am a novice screenwriter but I found it very easy to learn Final Draft. If you are taking a class you may be able to qualify for a discount which makes it more affordable.
customer_reviews.author: SF Buyer

customer_reviews.title: FD 10 is a 10!!
customer_reviews.text: Final Draft 10 is a 10! It's the version I've waited so long for. From concept using the beat bored to narrative dictation and everything in between, you can't ask for much more. My favorite part is when it reads the script back to you.
customer_reviews.author: Jax Martin

customer_reviews.title: It's all right in front of me!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE Final Draft! I'm visual so I love having all of the information I need neatly organized and in front of me when I need it.
customer_reviews.author: LEO1701

customer_reviews.title: Now I can just concentrate on writing
customer_reviews.text: Final Draft is a great piece of software which simplifies the technical aspects of writing and gives me the freedom to concentrate on the creative process. Well worth the money I spent on it.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Ben Ari

customer_reviews.title: There’s a reason why it’s the industry standard
customer_reviews.text: It’s simple and intuitive, but has a lot of extra features and tools to keep the creativity flowing.
customer_reviews.author: J Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: A screenwriter’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: Writing with Final Draft 10 is easy. It allows me to write without interruption, bolstering my creative flow.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Groves

customer_reviews.title: Solid Upgrade - you had me at collaboration
customer_reviews.text: Beat board and Story Map are incredible improvement! you have to watch the videos to really "get it" though, don't just jump in and think you're going to understand how it all works together. Collaboration is a great addition as well. My writing partner and / have used it three times this weekend. I wish they'd allow you to collaborate on the Beat Board part, but maybe that is coming. Still, a really solid upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: SFScreenwriter73

customer_reviews.title: The right tool
customer_reviews.text: Whether you are a professional or an aspiring screenwriter or somewhere in between, you need the tools to get the job done. That's what Final Draft is for me. Jo Malone
customer_reviews.author: Jo Malone

product_meta.title: Final Draft 10
product_meta.description:
Write movie and TV scripts, stage plays, and new media with Final Draft - the number-one selling entertainment industry-standard application that combines powerful word processing with professional script formatting. Scene View - Outline your script and reorder scenes using a simple drag-and-drop interface. Navigator - View, sort and filter the important details of your scenes, Scriptnotes and Characters. Index Cards - Easily outline your story and restructure your script one scene at a time. ScriptNotes - Make general or element specific color-coded notes that won't affect your script's pagination. Templates - Over 100 classic and current television shows, screenplay, stageplay, and graphic novel templates are available with the option to customize your own. Pagination - Final Draft paginates your script perfectly to industry standards universally for OSX, PC or iPad. Watermarking in Printing and PDF Options - You can print your watermarked script to any printer with standardized paper size or save directly to PDF in flawless script format. Final Draft Courier Font - We have created the ideal screenwriting font that is easy to read while meeting industry requirements. Format Assistant - After you're finished with your first draft, run Format Assistant to make sure there are no formatting errors. Retina and Full Screen Support - Benefit from the convenience of distraction-free writing in full screen mode, as well as retina display compatibility.

Instructions:

Please note: This item does not contain a disc; you must visit http://www.finaldraft.com/install to download the program.

1. After you have placed your order and received your keycard, locate your customer number on the back of the card.
2. Follow the instructions at http://www.finaldraft.com/install to install the program.
3. Enter the customer number from your keycard to activate the program.
4. Make sure to register the program in case you need customer support.
5. You are all set!
